title: Triumphant Adventure: Piano, Strings, and Percussion Pack
description: Triumphant and Uplifting!  This pack features a beautiful combination of orchestral strings, piano, and percussion.  Perfect for adventure or action games.  Contains both cinematic and classical music elements with a retro vibe.
longDescription:
Triumphant and Uplifting! This pack features a beautiful combination of orchestral strings, piano, and percussion.  This is a brand new unique collection of songs.


Link to YouTube preview


  1. Pro quality music recorded, mixed and mastered by a professional audio engineer!
  2. Perfect for adventure or action games. Contains both cinematic and classical music elements with a retro vibe.
  3. Alternate versions included!
  4. Adventure, Triumph, & Tension


Track List


  1. Adventure Ship
  2. Forest Star
  3. Universe Master
  4. Triumphant Adventure
  5. Danger Us
  6. Creatures
  7. Cherish
  8. Mister Rhee
  9. Seekers
  10. Dronesy
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  High quality audio
  •  Professionally mixed & mastered
  •  Make your production sound legit!

Number of Audio Wavs: 25

Number of Audio Cues: 25

Sample rate / bit rate: 48k, 24bit WAV

Does music loop: Some loops included

Minutes of audio provided: 57

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
